title: Authors and Citation
text: Hesselberth J (2025). cpp11bigwig: Read bigWig bigBed Files. R package version 0.1.2.9000, https://rnabioco.github.io/cpp11bigwig/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {cpp11bigwig: Read bigWig and bigBed Files},   author = {Jay Hesselberth},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.2.9000},   url = {https://rnabioco.github.io/cpp11bigwig/}, }

title: Read bigWig and bigBed Files
text: cpp11bigwig provides read-access bigWig bigBed files using libBigWig https://github.com/dpryan79/libBigWig.

title: Read bigWig and bigBed Files
code: # Install development version from GitHub # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("rnabioco/cpp11bigwig")

title: Read bigWig and bigBed Files
code: library(cpp11bigwig)  bw <- system.file("extdata", "test.bw", package = "cpp11bigwig") read_bigwig(bw) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   chrom start   end value #>   <chr> <int> <int> <dbl> #> 1 1         0     1 0.100 #> 2 1         1     2 0.200 #> 3 1         2     3 0.300 #> 4 1       100   150 1.40  #> 5 1       150   151 1.5   #> 6 10      200   300 2  bb <- system.file("extdata", "test.bb", package = "cpp11bigwig") read_bigbed(bb) #> # A tibble: 3 × 12 #>   chrom  start    end name  score strand thickStart thickEnd reserved blockCount #>   <chr>  <int>  <int> <chr> <int> <chr>       <int>    <int>    <int>      <int> #> 1 chr1  4.80e6 4.84e6 test…     1 +         4797973  4836816        1          9 #> 2 chr10 4.85e6 4.88e6 diff…     1 +         4848118  4880877        1          6 #> 3 chr20 5.07e6 5.15e6 negs…     1 -         5073253  5152630        1         14 #> # ℹ 2 more variables: blockSizes <chr>, chromStarts <chr>

what: cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package
title: cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package
text: bigwig provides methods read data bigWig files. bigwig uses cpp11 wrap libBigWig @dpryan79.

title: cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package
cpp11bigwig: read data from bigWig files — cpp11bigwig-package

what: Read data from bigBed files. — read_bigbed
title: Read data from bigBed files. — read_bigbed
text: Columns automatically typed based autoSql schema embedded bigBed file. Integer types (uint, int) become R integers, floating point types (float, double) become R doubles, types (including array types like int[blockCount]) remain character strings.

title: Read data from bigBed files. — read_bigbed
code: read_bigbed(bbfile, chrom = NULL, start = NULL, end = NULL)

title: Read data from bigBed files. — read_bigbed
text: bbfile filename bigBed file chrom read data specific chromosome start start position data end end position data

title: Read data from bigBed files. — read_bigbed
Read data from bigBed files. — read_bigbed
code: bb <- system.file("extdata", "test.bb", package = "cpp11bigwig")  read_bigbed(bb) #> # A tibble: 3 × 12 #>   chrom  start    end name  score strand thickStart thickEnd reserved blockCount #>   <chr>  <int>  <int> <chr> <int> <chr>       <int>    <int>    <int>      <int> #> 1 chr1  4.80e6 4.84e6 test…     1 +         4797973  4836816        1          9 #> 2 chr10 4.85e6 4.88e6 diff…     1 +         4848118  4880877        1          6 #> 3 chr20 5.07e6 5.15e6 negs…     1 -         5073253  5152630        1         14 #> # ℹ 2 more variables: blockSizes <chr>, chromStarts <chr>  read_bigbed(bb, chrom = "chr10") #> # A tibble: 1 × 12 #>   chrom  start    end name  score strand thickStart thickEnd reserved blockCount #>   <chr>  <int>  <int> <chr> <int> <chr>       <int>    <int>    <int>      <int> #> 1 chr10 4.85e6 4.88e6 diff…     1 +         4848118  4880877        1          6 #> # ℹ 2 more variables: blockSizes <chr>, chromStarts <chr>

what: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
title: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
code: read_bigwig(bwfile, chrom = NULL, start = NULL, end = NULL, as = NULL)

title: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
text: bwfile filename bigWig file chrom read data specific chromosome start start position data end end position data return data specific type. default tibble (tbl) GRanges (gr)

title: Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
Read data from bigWig files. — read_bigwig
code: bw <- system.file("extdata", "test.bw", package = "cpp11bigwig")  read_bigwig(bw) #> # A tibble: 6 × 4 #>   chrom start   end value #>   <chr> <int> <int> <dbl> #> 1 1         0     1 0.100 #> 2 1         1     2 0.200 #> 3 1         2     3 0.300 #> 4 1       100   150 1.40  #> 5 1       150   151 1.5   #> 6 10      200   300 2      read_bigwig(bw, chrom = "10") #> # A tibble: 1 × 4 #>   chrom start   end value #>   <chr> <int> <int> <dbl> #> 1 10      200   300     2  read_bigwig(bw, chrom = "1", start = 100, end = 130) #> # A tibble: 1 × 4 #>   chrom start   end value #>   <chr> <int> <int> <dbl> #> 1 1       100   130  1.40  read_bigwig(bw, as = "GRanges") #> GRanges object with 6 ranges and 1 metadata column: #>       seqnames    ranges strand |     score #>          <Rle> <IRanges>  <Rle> | <numeric> #>   [1]        1       0-1      * |       0.1 #>   [2]        1       1-2      * |       0.2 #>   [3]        1       2-3      * |       0.3 #>   [4]        1   100-150      * |       1.4 #>   [5]        1   150-151      * |       1.5 #>   [6]       10   200-300      * |       2.0 #>   ------- #>   seqinfo: 2 sequences from an unspecified genome; no seqlengths

title: cpp11bigwig 0.1.2
text: CRAN release: 2025-08-18 Fix parsing bigBed end coordinates.

title: cpp11bigwig 0.1.1
cpp11bigwig 0.1.0
cpp11bigwig 0.0.0.9000
text: libBigWig mostly untouched excpect removal fprintf statements (R won’t allow linked libraries) fixups ASAN errors, mostly GNU-specific pointer arithmetic. cpp11bigwig passes ASAN valgrind checks (via rhub).
